channel.title: Movies on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Movies on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: fooo- wooo- vie?
item.description: anyway.. so the movie “Lost in Translation” is good. I know. I saw it. it is nice. I enjoy Sofia Coppola’s movies. even though they are rather airy - it is an airy I appreciate. Bill Murrey was great.

item.title: eminem is angry
item.description: I just watched 8 mile. it is good. a little over acting a little underacting. but eminem is not an actor so it is a rather good movie.. I enjoyed it. he does have quite a bit of anger. a lot of anger.. over simple things.. it is sad..tonight I think we are going to watch a bunch of movies. it will be fun. the window is open in my room and in my living room.
